sentences.en: Criminal behaviour seems to be the norm in this neighbourhood.
sentences.cn: 犯罪行为似乎是这一带的正常现象.

sentences.en: Deviation from the norm is not tolerated.
sentences.cn: 不能容忍离经叛道行为。

sentences.en: Families of six or seven are the norm in Borough Park.
sentences.cn: 在区公园住宅区六口或七口之家十分普遍。

sentences.en: It has been authorized by another legal norm of a higher rank.
sentences.cn: 它已经得到另一条最高层次的法律规范的认可.

sentences.en: It was a norm for any major company.
sentences.cn: 这在各大公司都是司空见惯的.

sentences.en: Joyce’s style of writing was a striking departure from the literary norm.
sentences.cn: 乔伊斯的写作风格与传统的文学风格大相径庭。

sentences.en: Mass advertising steadily destroyed competitive dailies; monopoly became the norm.
sentences.cn: 大宗广告不断地摧毁竞争日报; 垄断成为普遍现象.

sentences.en: Norm approach for role assignation in grid workflow.
sentences.cn: 网格工作流中角色分配的Norm方法.

sentences.en: Of his age, the child is above the norm in arithmetic.
sentences.cn: 在他那个年龄, 这个孩子的算术能力是超过标准的.

sentences.en: Ordinariness is his norm; what is extraordinary tends to be suspect.
sentences.cn: 他崇尚普通, 对非常之举心怀疑忌.

sentences.en: The changes will lead to more flexible leases, and leases nearer to 15 years than the present norm of 25 years.
sentences.cn: 这些变化将带来更灵活的、接近15年的租期，而不是现行的常规为25年的租期。

sentences.en: The euclidean norm of an n - vector x with real or complex components is defined as following.
sentences.cn: 凡具实数分量或复数分量的n - 维向量x的欧氏范数被定义如下.

sentences.en: The norm system to measure hot and damp comfort property is established.
sentences.cn: 建立了衡量热湿舒适性的指标体系.

sentences.en: There's a production norm below which each worker must not fall.
sentences.cn: 每个工人的产量都不得低于生产指标.

sentences.en: These events were aberrations from the norm.

words.tran_cn: 常态；[化学] 当量浓度；[化学] 规定浓度
正常化；标准化；正规化；常态化
使正常化；使规格化，使标准化
规范，基准；[经管]定额，分配之工作量

trans.tran_cn: 标准，规范，准则，（劳动）定额
trans.tran_en: the usual or normal situation, way of doing something etc
